mapper.insert: insert into patient (patientId, patientPassword, patientName, patientGender, patientBirth, patientAddress, patientPhone, patientEmail) values (#{patientId},#{patientPassword},#{patientName},#{patientGender},#{patientBirth},#{patientAddress},#{patientPhone},#{patientEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM patient WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
